vehicles.description: This Car is a beast on the road.
This Car is a beast on the road.

Almost new range rover. Imported from the UK.
Specs :
Fog Lights
Leather Seats
Central Locking
Power Steering
Power Windows
Side Steps
Reverse Camera

Turbo Charged

Memory Seats

DVD/CD Player
Lumbar Adjustment Support

comments.content: He's got a nose for bugs!
